sense.name: 市, market
sense.examples:
黑市 black market
它已开始上市. It has appeared on the market.
菜市 vegetable market

sense.name: 市, city, municipality,
sense.examples:
港市 port city,
省辖市 provincial city
市中心 the heart of the city.

sense.name: 市, pertaining to the Chinese system of weights and measures
sense.commentary: pertaining to the Chinese system of weights and measures.
sense.examples:
市尺 chi ( a unit of length.)
市斤 jin ( a unit of weight)
市寸 cun (a unit of lenghth)
